titleStmt.title: It is a noyse of terror, to heare the guns like thunder,
titleStmt.author: Hammond, John, fl. 1642-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Hammond, dwelling in Holborne.,

notesStmt.note: Title from first line of text.
Fragment of unidentified work: first part mutilated affecting title, text, and ill.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Tunes: [...] warres againe: or, The Maying time.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
